Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a news article or a blog post.

content.description: The main content of the article in Markdown format.

imageUrl.description: URL of the main image for the article.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the article was created.

Player.title: Player
Player.description: Represents a player in the team.

name.description: The full name of the player.

imageUrl.description: URL of the player's portrait photo.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant image.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Stores individual news articles for the club.

/players/{playerId}.description: Stores individual player profiles for the team.
